show.title: Ennai saithavale
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/Umbsxp
show.description: When an ambitious fashion design graduate's family arranges her marriage to a wealthy businessman, she must choose between following her dreams of entrepreneurship and yielding to family expectations, all while the persistent suitor refuses to take no for an answer.
show.description_secondary: When an ambitious fashion design graduate's family arranges her marriage to a wealthy businessman, she must choose between following her dreams of entrepreneurship and yielding to family expectations, all while the persistent suitor refuses to take no for an answer.
